unit: Unit 8 | Inference for Categorical Data: Chi-Square
title: Sports Drinks: Chi-squared Test Statistic
question_text:
Suppose a random survey was taken in a large urban high school to determine if vending machine location affects whether sports drinks are more likely to be ordered.
A large single sample of size n = $500$ was taken over the last week. In the cafeteria, $78$ of the $165$ drinks purchased were sports drinks. In the gym, $98$ of the $157$ drinks purchased were sports drinks, and in the auditorium, $54$ of the $178$ drinks purchased were sports drinks.
What is the chi-squared test statistic and approximate p-value?
